message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm looking to save some money, and $80 is the most I'm willing to pay.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand you're looking for a deal, but $80 is too low for me.  Could you do $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $90. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
